title: Saar Biotech-PCM + Cetirizine HCL + Phenylephrine HCL Suspension|Contract Manufacturing Company Pharmaceuticals
meta: Saar Biotech is a pharmaceutical company which is situated in Himachal Pradesh(Baddi).The combination of  PCM,  Cetirizine, Hydrochloride, Phenylephrine Suspension is used to treat headache, fever, body aches, runny or stuffy nose, sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and sinus congestion caused by allergies, the common cold, or the flu.
